layout.singingstanza: When I grow up, I want to be a man of God. I want to be some -- one who is full of life. I want to be some -- one who loves the Lord, And so I choose to be a man of God. There is noth -- ing else in the world I'd ra -- ther be, There is noth -- ing else in the world that I'd ra -- ther be. When I grow up, I want to be a man of God. I want to be some -- one who is full of life. I want to be some -- one who loves the Lord, And so I choose to be a man of God. And e -- ven though I'm still a kid, The choice is clear to me. A man of God is what I am— A man of God, that's ex -- act -- ly what I want to be.

lyrics.stanza: When I grow up, I want to be a man of God. I want to be someone who is full of life. I want to be someone who loves the Lord, And so I choose to be a man of God. There is nothing else in the world I'd rather be, There is nothing else in the world that I'd rather be.
When I grow up, I want to be a man of God. I want to be someone who is full of life. I want to be someone who loves the Lord, And so I choose to be a man of God.
And even though I'm still a kid, The choice is clear to me. A man of God is what I am— A man of God, that's exactly what I want to be.
